name: facebook-bot
description: A basic Facebook messenger bot implementation in NodeJS. The code demonstrates both types i.e postbacks and text, How to use built in Facebook messenger templates and consume 3rd party API's to respond to users. > There is a complete Medium blog on how to get started with building the bot and deploying it to a cloud server. You can click on this [link](https://medium.com/@slayer9191/build-your-own-facebook-messenger-bot-with-node-js-1f2ec0165d2) to check the complete tutorial.
